DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To evaluate association physical exercise obese overweight woman maternal , perinatal outcome perception woman quality life . Methods : A randomized control clinical trial 78 pregnant woman . Overweight obese ( BMI ≥ 26 kg / m² ) , gestational age 14 24 week age 18 year include . They divide two random group : one exercise program supervision guidance receive home exercise ( study group ) another follow standard routine prenatal care service ( control group ) . Both group receive standardize nutritional counseling department nutrition dietetics questionnaire measure quality life WHOQOL-short 14 - 24 week 36 week pregnancy . The intervention result analyze intention treat . A P value le 0.05 used determine statistical significance .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Exercise Influence Among Overweight Obese Pregnant Women
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To evaluate association physical exercise obese overweight woman maternal , perinatal outcome perception woman quality life . Methods : A randomized control clinical trial 78 pregnant woman . Overweight obese ( BMI ≥ 26 kg / m² ) , gestational age 14 24 week age 18 year include . They divide two random group : one exercise program supervision guidance receive home exercise ( study group ) another follow standard routine prenatal care service ( control group ) . Both group receive standardize nutritional counseling department nutrition dietetics questionnaire measure quality life WHOQOL-short 14 - 24 week 36 week pregnancy . The intervention result analyze intention treat . A P value le 0.05 used determine statistical significance .
DOC.criteria: Overweight obese ( BMI ≥ 26 kg / m² ) , Gestational age 14 24 week age 18 year No contraindication physical exercise pregnancy
